title: Duplicate task in mission control
description: There are a lot of duplicate and junk tasks. You should clean this and make sure everything is logical and well tracked.

comments.author: agent-tank
comments.content:
Cleanup complete!

**Before:** 41 task files
**After:** 5 real tasks

**Actions taken:**
- Archived 35 auto-generated session duplicates to archived-tasks/
- Deleted 1 junk test task
- Fixed agent-bridge.js to prevent duplicate task creation on restart
- Added rehydrateFromDisk() and findExistingTaskForSession() functions
- Created cleanup-log-20260205.md with full details
